ing: 1 pound cubed stew meat OR round steak
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
des: "This delicious and easy minestrone is made in the morning and cooks all day in the oven for a wonderful soup your family will love. Sometimes I'll add a can of beans, or frozen corn, or cooked carrots, if I have it on hand. If not, though, it's delicious as is!!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).
In a 10x15 inch baking dish, combine the meat, minestrone soup, tomato soup, water and onion soup mix. Mix well.
Bake at 250 degrees F (120 degrees C) for 8 hours. (Note: If needed, you can bake for less time at a higher temperature; just make sure that the meat is completely cooked through.)
